title: Dark Mage (Abyss)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Dark mage is located at the centre of the Abyss. He can repair damaged essence pouches for free and give back an Abyssal book and/or Small pouch to the player if lost. Note that it's not needed to actually bring him the pouches, because he can repair them even while they are in the player's bank. An alternative is to contact him with the lunar NPC Contact spell. This is a no risk option for pouch repairs. He seems to be wearing Beads of the dead.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Dark mage
This article is about the Dark mage found in the Abyss. For the Dark Mage found in West Ardougne, see Dark Mage.
Dark mage
Released13 June 2005 (Update)
MembersYes
RaceHuman
LocationCentre of the Abyss
QuestTemple of the Eye
GenderMale
OptionsTalk-to, Repairs
ExamineAn initiate of Zamorak.
Map
Advanced data
NPC ID2583

The Dark mage is located at the centre of the Abyss. He can repair damaged essence pouches for free and give back an Abyssal book and/or Small pouch to the player if lost. Note that it's not needed to actually bring him the pouches, because he can repair them even while they are in the player's bank. An alternative is to contact him with the lunar NPC Contact spell. This is a no risk option for pouch repairs. He seems to be wearing Beads of the dead.

His job as a Zamorakian disciple is to maintain the rift so that the ZMI (and players who've completed the mini-quest) can access it. If talked to, he will offer a dire set of consequences if he fails in this task (including head explosion, if lucky, or universe explosion, if not-so-lucky).

It is said that the Dark mage can stay in the Abyss for a long period of time because time in the Abyss passes slowly compared to the time in the RuneScape Realm, so the Dark mage does not need feeding (according to the Mage of Zamorak who teleports players to the Abyss).

He will refuse to give the player a Small pouch if they already have a Colossal pouch, citing the potential dimensional complications of doing so.

Treasure Trails[edit | edit source]

Dark mage is the solution to the hard anagram clue: DEKAGRAM. The answer to his question is 13. He must be spoken to in-person; NPC Contact will not progress the clue.

Dialogue[edit | edit source]

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
31 March 2022
(update) 		Hotfix

The Dark Mage will now refuse to give the player a Small pouch after the player has created the Colossal pouch.

6 January 2014
(update | poll)

The Dark Mage can now be contacted with the NPC Contact spell.
